name: Hijri
0:
”Alexa, ask hijri date for today's date”
”Alexa, open hijri date and tell today's date”
”Alexa, ask hijri date for tomorrow's date”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hijri date
des:
The skill provides date in Hijri for today or tomorrow's date.

If you simply launch the skill, it will tell today's date by default.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
